objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='grad1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#1A2E4C;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#2C3E50;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='grad2' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='0%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#3498DB;stop-opacity:0.8'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#3498DB;stop-opacity:0'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#grad1)'/><rect x='40' y='40' width='1000' height='1000' rx='20' stroke='rgba(255,255,255,0.15)' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/><rect x='60' y='60' width='960' height='960' rx='15' stroke='rgba(255,255,255,0.05)' stroke-width='1' fill='none'/><path d='M0,300 C250,270 400,370 550,400 C750,440 900,390 1080,450 L1080,0 L0,0 Z' fill='url(#grad2)' opacity='0.5'/><path d='M0,780 C150,820 350,750 550,800 C750,850 900,780 1080,850 L1080,1080 L0,1080 Z' fill='url(#grad2)' opacity='0.5'/><circle cx='200' cy='200' r='100' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.05)'/><circle cx='880' cy='880' r='150' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.05)'/><circle cx='200' cy='880' r='80' fill='rgba(52,152,219,0.1)'/><circle cx='880' cy='200' r='120' fill='rgba(52,152,219,0.1)'/></svg>

objects.text:
• Ultra-quiet clicking for distraction-free work
• Multi-device connectivity for up to 3 devices
• Ergonomic design for all-day comfort
• Long-lasting battery life up to 24 months

product_details.name: Logitech M590 Silent Multi-Device Wireless Mouse - Ultimate Comfort & Productivity
product_details.description:
• Ultra-quiet clicking for distraction-free work environment
• Multi-device connectivity - Connect and switch between 3 devices seamlessly
• Advanced optical tracking for precise cursor control on most surfaces
• Ergonomic right-handed design for all-day comfort
• Long-lasting battery life up to 24 months
• Compact and portable design perfect for home, office, or travel
• Easy-switch technology with convenient numbered buttons (1-2-3)
• Logitech Flow enabled for cross-computer file sharing and control
• Durable build quality with premium matte finish
• Compatible with Windows, Mac, Chrome OS, and Linux

banner_details:
The banner showcases a promotional tech product advertisement with a sleek, modern layout. It features a bold headline using two distinct text layers—**heading_1** and **heading_2**—that emphasize the offer. Below the offer, the **product_name** and **product_category** text layers identify the product. A **decorative_line** visually separates the heading section from the **description**, which highlights key features in a bullet format. Two taglines, **tagline_1** and **tagline_2**, reinforce the benefit message. The **price** element is displayed prominently near the bottom left, followed by a clear call-to-action using **cta** and **cta_background**. A **product_image** is shown on the right, balanced against a layered, gradient-rich **background**.

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Blue (#1A2E4C)
- Charcoal (#2C3E50)
- Sky Blue (#3498DB)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek Logitech mouse with a modern matte-black finish, exuding sophistication and professionalism. The primary color is a deep charcoal black (#1E1E1E), with subtle highlights and shadows that offer depth. Accents like the scroll wheel’s silver edges (#B0B0B0) and the white Logitech branding (#FFFFFF) create a sharp contrast, drawing focus to key features. Numbers on the left buttons are also in white, enhancing functional clarity. These colors are well-blended yet distinctly highlighted, maintaining a minimalist aesthetic. A matching advertisement banner can use this palette—#1E1E1E, #2C2C2C, #B0B0B0, and #FFFFFF—for a clean, high-tech appeal.
